results.original_title: Dirk Scheele & De Liedjesband - Vroem Vroem
results.overview: Children's music from Dirk Scheele and friends
results.title: Dirk Scheele & De Liedjesband - Vroem Vroem

results.overview: A deformed prince is forced into a life of sexual servitude and then becomes the rising symbol of the sexual freedom movement.
results.title: Viva Dirk

results.overview: The lovely Ching Li and handsome Chang I star as star-and-sword-crossed comrades who take on the vicious Black Tigers gang in a quest for hidden wealth. There's action galore, until the final, fiery fight in a temple of treasure.
results.title: The Secret of the Dirk

results.overview: The Dirk Diggler Story is a 1988 mockumentary short film written and directed by Paul Thomas Anderson. It follows the rise and fall of Dirk Diggler, a well-endowed male porn star. The character was modeled on American porn actor John Holmes. The film was later expanded into Anderson's 1997 film Boogie Nights.
results.title: The Dirk Diggler Story

results.overview: Two down-on-their-luck employees of an unsuccessful pest control service, arrive late to a job at their only paying customer's house, to find themselves replaced by a rival pest controller. Unemployed and angry, the two plot the ultimate revenge.
results.title: Dirks Pest Control

results.overview: In midwinter the German illusionist Dirk Ohm arrives in the small town Grong, a place ridden by the disappearance of a young local woman Maria. Dirk soon finds himself searching for Maria side by side with the villagers of Grong; and slowly he falls in love with the missing woman. This fictional story pays tribute to a real character, and to his mysterious disappearance in the winter of 2003.
results.title: The Disappearing Illusionist

results.original_title: Dirkschneider : Live - Back to the roots - Accepted!
results.overview: After putting out a live double CD, fans were asking for a visual output. Now, the show recorded on December 9, 2016 in Brno, Czech Republic at Hala Valdova will be released in video format to complement the audio release. A celebration of Dirkscheider's ACCEPT era, there's a cover version of Frank Sinatra's "My Way" as a bonus track on the CD and vinyl.
results.title: Dirkschneider : Live - Back to the roots - Accepted!

results.overview: Two friends experiment with drugs and end up stranded at a local store with some bizarre patrons.
results.title: Dirk and Betty

results.overview: An 8-year-old boy and his dog are left to face a vast desert wasteland alone after a plane crash, while an army of men and machines penetrate the desert searching for them. Based on true events.
results.title: Dirkie

results.overview: Dirkjan, a nerdy guy turns Leader of the World. Where does his sudden hunger for power come from? And what is the Big Plan?
results.title: Dirkjan Heerst!

results.overview: Documentary exploration of Dirk Bogarde's private life and long-term affair with manager, Anthony Forwood, seen through home movies and excerpts from Bogarde's memoirs.
results.title: The Private Dirk Bogarde

results.original_title: Dickie, du fehlst! Warum wir Dirk Bach auch heute noch schmerzlich vermissen
results.title: Dickie, du fehlst! Warum wir Dirk Bach auch heute noch schmerzlich vermissen

results.overview: Gray clouds gather above the towpath along the canal. A couple tufts silently in their Mitsubishi Colt. They talk about the child they left behind.
results.title: Sara & Dirk

results.original_title: De geboorte en dood van Dirk Vandersteen jr.
results.overview: The wife of a local dictator gets a miscarriage during a failed assault by rebels. The dictators' brother suggesst to present the newly born baby of one a the dead rebels as his posterity.
results.title: De geboorte en dood van Dirk Vandersteen jr.

results.title: Op stap met Dirk Scheele de Film
